mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIS_VISITS WHERE FIRSTVISIT BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'DD') AND SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIS_VISITS WHERE FIRSTVISIT BETWEEN NEXT_DAY(SYSDATE-7, '월요일') AND SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIS_VISITS WHERE FIRSTVISIT BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MONTH') AND SYSDATE

SELECT SUBSTR(TRUNC(FIRSTVISIT, 'DD'),7) AS GRPHDATE, COUNT(*) AS GRPHCOUNT FROM VIS_VISITS WHERE FIRSTVISIT BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE-14, 'DD') AND SYSDATE GROUP BY TRUNC(FIRSTVISIT, 'DD') ORDER BY TRUNC(FIRSTVISIT, 'DD')
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM VIS_VISITS WHERE FIRSTVISIT BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE-14+#{param1}, 'DD') AND SYSDATE+#{param1}
SELECT ROUND(AVG(VISITCOUNT)) FROM VIS_VISITS WHERE FIRSTVISIT BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE-14+#{param1}, 'DD') AND SYSDATE+#{param1}
SELECT ROUND(AVG((LASTVISIT-FIRSTVISIT) * 24 * 60)) "ONTIME" FROM VIS_VISITS WHERE FIRSTVISIT BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE-14+#{param1}, 'DD') AND SYSDATE+#{param1} ORDER BY FIRSTVISIT

SELECT MEMBERID FROM VIS_VISITS GROUP BY MEMBERID HAVING COUNT(*)=(SELECT MAX(MYCOUNT) FROM (SELECT MEMBERID, COUNT(*) AS MYCOUNT FROM VIS_VISITS WHERE MEMBERID IN (SELECT ID FROM MEM_MEMBER WHERE ADMIN=0) AND FIRSTVISIT BETWEEN TRUNC(SYSDATE-14+#{param1}, 'DD') AND SYSDATE+#{param1} GROUP BY MEMBERID))
